EmailTemplate.name: 11-17-20 DBNK SMB Campaign Email 3.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: [Last Chance] Small Business Banking: Time to Sink or Swim
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Last chance to register! Small Business Banking: Time to Sink or Swim Thursday, November 19 at 2 p.m. EST Use code ncr1119 for complimentary registration
Businesses need a stable banking relationship—now more than ever. Hear from Ron Shevlin of Cornerstone Advisors, along with Doug Brown and Erica Pilon of NCR Digital Banking, as they discuss the critical business digital banking solutions FIs must offer to stay afloat. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Neobanks are coming for your SMB clients—Get a battle plan in a NEW webinar. Small Business Digital Banking for the Post-COVID World Thursday, December 3 at 1 p.m. EST
Sign up to hear from Jacob Jegher of Javelin Strategy & Research, along with Doug Brown and Erica Pilon of NCR Digital Banking, as they discuss the underserved small business segment in banking—and the neobanks competing for these relationships. They’ll share proprietary research and examine what FIs can do to win this battle. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
